cast.name: 尤里·洛文塔尔 Yuri Lowenthal

director.name: 布莱恩·沃尔克-怀斯 Brian Volk-Weiss

trans_title: 出土的图标 第八季
introduction: To get Stan Lee and Steve Ditko’s iconic webslinger to the big screen, Marvel had to give up control of their flagship hero to another studio. Icons Unearthed: Spider-man tells the story of the tug of war between Marvel and Sony and how two studios found a way to share the character and the profits. Spider-man’s journey to the screen overcomes bankruptcy, multiple lawsuits, reboots, and unrealized potential. Taking on the responsibility of directing, Sam Raimi brings the hero to new heights, before suffering a major fall. When Sam walks away, Sony has to reinvent the character or lose the rights. Webb’s version brings a new look and a new love interest, but it’s not enough to compete with the Marvel juggernaut. As Marvel reclaims creative control, can Sony adapt to the Marvel Way?E1 Icons Unearthed: Spider-Man - Swinging into ActionE2 Icons Unearthed: Spider-Man - Saving the DayE3 Icons Unearthed: Spider-Man - The Kids Want to See the PuppetsE4 Icons Unearthed: Spider-Man - A Venom Too FarE5 Icons Unearthed: Spider-Man - Caught in the WebE6 Icons Unearthed: Spider-Man - The Marvel WayProducers:Alyssa Michek, Benjamin J. Frost, Brian Volk-Weiss, Cisco Henson
